description: This file defines a front-end UI component named 'Home' using Lightning.js and Blits framework. It imports other components such as Loader and Button, and renders a layout with animated elements, images, and text, along with associated state management and lifecycle hooks.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Lightning.js component representing the home page UI, with animated logo, loader, text, and button elements, along with associated state and lifecycle hooks.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Method to cyclically update the loader's color from a predefined color array at specified intervals.
